questions.question: What is the Incubation period of chicken egg?
What should be the optimum temperature in celsius for the eggs to hatch?
Which part of the egg is responsible for chick embryo development?

Write them in correct order of chick embryonic development
a) Heart beating.
b) Nervous system
c) Eye pigmentation
d) Appearance of beak
What is the pipping process in chick embryology?

answers.a: The stage where the chick starts to develop feathers
answers.b: The process by which the chick absorbs the remaining yolk
answers.c: The stage where the chick starts to move around inside the egg
answers.d: The process by which the chick breaks through the eggshell to hatch

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT one of the extra-embryonic membranes in the chick embryo?
